chapter.title: Getting Started with the Knowledge Editor

section.title: Logging In
section.para: To access Knowledge Editor, you need a username and temporary password assigned to you by the application administrator. The application administrator has the ability to manage project permissions, and user accounts. You should receive an email with login information (be sure to check your spam folder). If you do not receive an email, contact the Knowledge administrator.

Once you log in, you will see one of two screens:
Welcome Screen
If the administrator has not assigned a project to your account, you will only be able to edit your user profile, e-mail, and password. Contact your administrator for project assignment.
Project-specific Welcome Screen
If a project has been assigned to you, Knowledge Editor will load, providing you a view of the taxonomy and announcements panels.
Image of the Editor screen after login displays a taxonomy list, announcements, and assigned projects.

para.emphasis: What happens if I forget my username/login?

answer.para: There are links to request your username or a password reset on the login page of the application. Select the information you need and provide the details requested to be notified of next steps.

You can review your account permissions under Account Preferences. To access this page, select your username in the top navigation menu, then select "Account Preferences". The table will display the projects assigned to you and the permissions you have in each project.
